typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pipeline_run_id as string ('a7b59fd3-d16a-4dbc-bd47-64a7ac30b3a6')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> QCTable
source(output(
		qc_id as integer,
		pipeline_name as string,
		pipeline_run_id as string,
		pipeline_trigger_time as timestamp,
		pkey_column_values as string,
		column_metric_error_values as string,
		table_schema as string,
		table_name as string,
		sql_query as string,
		column_metric_name as string,
		alert_code as string,
		qc_type_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT * FROM dqm.v_qc_exception_detail WHERE pipeline_run_id ='a7b59fd3-d16a-4dbc-bd47-64a7ac30b3a6' AND table_schema='nucc' AND table_name = 'nucc_taxonomy'"),
	format: 'query') ~> QCExceptionDetail
QCTable derive(dqm_alert_code = 'P',
		pkey_column_values = concat($pkey_column)) ~> CreateTempAlertCode
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="R") ~> RedAlert
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="O") ~> OrangeAlert
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="Y") ~> YellowAlert
RedAlertTempColumn aggregate(groupBy(temp_alert_code,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> RedAlertTable
OrangeAlert aggregate(groupBy(pkey_column_values,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> OrangeAlertRecord
YellowAlert aggregate(groupBy(pkey_column_values,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> YellowAlertRecord
RedAlertFlag, OrangeAlertRecord lookup(CreateTempAlertCode@pkey_column_values == OrangeAlertRecord@pkey_column_values,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OrangeAlertFlag
OrangeAlertFlag, YellowAlertRecord lookup(CreateTempAlertCode@pkey_column_values == YellowAlertRecord@pkey_column_values,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> YellowAlertFlag
RedAlert derive(temp_alert_code = 'P') ~> RedAlertTempColumn
CreateTempAlertCode, RedAlertTable lookup(dqm_alert_code == temp_alert_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RedAlertFlag
YellowAlertFlag select(mapColumn(
		dqm_alert_code,
		pkey_column_values = CreateTempAlertCode@pkey_column_values,
		alert_code_red = RedAlertTable@alert_code,
		alert_code_orange = OrangeAlertRecord@alert_code,
		alert_code_yellow = YellowAlertRecord@alert_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CleanUpColumns
CleanUpColumns derive(final_alert_code = iifNull(iifNull(alert_code_red,alert_code_orange,alert_code_yellow),dqm_alert_code)) ~> CreateFinalAlertCode
CreateFinalAlertCode filter(final_alert_code!='R') ~> NonRedRecord
NonRedRecord select(mapColumn(
		final_alert_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDataColumns
TargetDataColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
